Amethyst javelins are a type of Ranged ammunition used by the light ballista and the heavy ballista. They are the second-strongest type of javelin, surpassed only by the dragon javelin.

They can be fletched by attaching amethyst javelin heads to javelin shafts at level 84 Fletching, granting 202.5 experience per 15 javelins made.

'''Amethyst javelins''' are a type of [[Ranged]] ammunition used by the [[light ballista]] and the [[heavy ballista]]. They are the second-strongest type of [[javelin]], surpassed only by the [[dragon javelin]].

They can be fletched by attaching [[amethyst javelin heads]] to [[javelin shaft]]s at level 84 [[Fletching]], granting 202.5 experience per 15 javelins made.
